content:
You are a recruiter. I'm going to give you qualities in an employer I want. Tell me where to apply. Has affinity groups that support “multigenerational” solutions
· Benefits that acknowledge some people who have Medicare want a Medicare supplement instead of basic health insurance
· Provides hours for care-taking as a benefit. Grandparents need this for different reasons than parents but everyone needs it at some point.
· Is employee-owned. Employee owned-companies just make sense. 
· Has a handle on how to measure results. I am a fan of John Doerr and his thoughts on measuring what matters, but anyone who wrestles with a focus on results is wrestling with the right angel.
· Offers base compensation with an annual bonus based on goals I get to negotiate with my boss.
· Does not require performance reviews. Instead, my boss and I would go over my portfolio of results once a year. My boss would be relieved not to have to write a stack of reviews and I would be relieved not to hear about my character flaws.
